EmailTemplate.name: 18-0424 CS App Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Complete your Community Solar Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Unlock the Benefits of Community Solar!Please use the button below to complete your application for BlueWave Community Solar.
Apply Here
Benefits you'll begin to enjoy with your share:
No Money Down - Only pay for solar credits you receive No Installation Necessary - Hassle-free solar! 10% Monthly Energy Savings - Pay for your solar credits at a discount Feel good! Your local farm creates local jobs and reduces air pollution
We hope you join the BlueWave Solar Community to start enjoying savings and a whole lot more!
- All of us here at BlueWave
CustomerCare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786-4100
Learn More About Us
